## False Bay Monitoring Tides
Extract and view tides critical for the water quality monitoring project. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rtide)
```


### Get tide data
From April to September 2021
```{r}
## Data extract ##
dat <- rtide::tide_height("Port Townsend", from = as.Date("2021-04-01"), to = as.Date("2021-09-01"), minutes = 10L, tz = "PST8PDT")

## add feet column ##
dat$TideHeight_ft <- dat$TideHeight * 3.281

## Clean up date data ##
dat$DateTime <- as.POSIXlt(dat$DateTime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s", tz = "PST8PDT")
```

Quick plot
```{r}
ggplot(data = dat, aes(x = DateTime, y = TideHeight_ft)) +
  geom_line()
```

### Filter tide data

Filter for all data when height is <= 4 feet. 
```{r}
dat.redu <- dat %>%
  filter(TideHeight_ft <= 4)


```
